solution_line_template: There are {total_girls} x {reading_girls_fraction} = <<{total_girls}*{reading_girls_fraction}={reading_girls}>>{reading_girls} girls who are reading.
There are {total_boys} x {reading_boys_fraction} = <<{total_boys}*{reading_boys_fraction}={reading_boys}>>{reading_boys} boys who are reading.

Thus, there are a total of {non_reading_girls} girls + {non_reading_boys} boys = <<{non_reading_girls}+{non_reading_boys}={total_non_reading_students}>>{total_non_reading_students} students who are not reading.
